name: Wurds (itch)
description:
Long ago, dot-matrix printers were a common output device. WURDS is a simple word guessing game that brings this now-ancient game technology into the palm of your hand!

You have five attempts to guess a five-letter word. After every incorrect guess, you'll receive feedback on which letters are:

  • in the correct location
  • in the word but in the incorrect location
  • not in the word at all

WURDS has two game modes:

  • In Daily, you'll try to guess the same words as everyone else playing the game
  • In Random, you'll try to guess a random word from the dictionary

WURDS tracks your wins and losses and you can use the History feature to view them alongside a convenient summary.
